row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 8)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 6)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 13)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(is_returning) >= 1)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 1)
col_desc: Queen returned to the competition during any season.
Queen has at least two lip sync wins.
Queen has one lip sync win.
